ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Rokenn. I figured it was to good to be true since it was easy as hell.

-Ranian

> -----Original Message-----
> From: chris.holden@... [mailto:chris.holden@...]
>
> BTW there is a spot in Overthere next to SF were the pathing
> is totally screwed
> up. We were fear kiting by there and the mobs just ran in to
> the wall. Kept fear
> up and killed them. Should I bug that or leave it to bad
> pathing? Reason I ask
> is I don't want to get in trouble for a bug exploit.
>

If a guide sees you doing this you will get a warning and possibly worse. I
would suggest not doing it again as it is an exploit to get creatures stuck
in the world geometry then kill them with no risk.

Rokenn

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with
the subject submissions.
